title: New hiring stipends for incoming doctoral students (Binghamton University)
text: ( Source : Binghamton University ) Binghamton University will add about $600, 000 each year for four years to its stipend pool for incoming doctoral students, beginning in fall 2016. The influx of funds - from the Road Map - will bring the
